name: Blue Lagoon
description: Blue Curaçao mixed with vodka and lemonade.

name: Mai Tai
description: The Mai Tai is a cocktail based on rum, Curaçao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice.

name: Margarita
description: A margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice often served with salt on the rim of the glass.

name: Old Fashioned
description: The old fashioned is a cocktail made by muddling sugar with bitters and water, adding whiskey or, less commonly, brandy, and garnishing with orange slice or zest and a cocktail cherry.

name: Pina Colada
description: The piña colada is a sweet cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut or coconut milk, and pineapple juice, usually served either blended or shaken with ice.

name: Queens Park Swizzle
description: More drier, complex variation of the original Mohito cocktail

name: Tequila Sunrise
description: The tequila sunrise is a cocktail made of tequila, orange juice, and grenadine syrup. It's served unmixed in a tall glass.

name: White Russian
description: A White Russian is a cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur and cream served with ice in an Old Fashioned glass.
